name: Cube Zombies
description:
Cube Zombies is a LowPoly Top Down Action Survival Shooter. There is an apocalypse coming! You'll need to kill as many cube zombies as possible.

Controls: WASD: Move, Mouse: Look, LMB Shoot, ESC: Pause

As a gift to you guys we have decided to make the first week completely free!

Any reviews and feedback is greatly appreciated.
